member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_INFO
member.summary: Describes device temperature data. Returned as part of when querying for temperature data with an IOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY request.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_INFO.Index
member.summary: Identifies the instance of temperature information. Starts from 0. Index 0 may indicate a composite value.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_INFO.Temperature
member.summary: A signed value that indicates the current temperature, in degrees Celsius.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_INFO.OverThreshold
member.summary: A signed value that specifies the maximum temperature within the desired threshold, in degrees Celsius.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_INFO.UnderThreshold
member.summary: A signed value that specifies the minimum temperature within the desired threshold, in degrees Celsius.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_INFO.OverThresholdChangable
member.summary: Indicates if OverThreshold can be changed by using IOCTL_STORAGE_SET_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_INFO.UnderThresholdChangable
member.summary: Indicates if UnderThreshold can be changed by using IOCTL_STORAGE_SET_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD.

member.name: STORAGE_TEMPERATURE_INFO.EventGenerated
member.summary: Indicates if a notification will be generated when the current temperature crosses a threshold.
